articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Strengthen routine immunisation capacities: WHO to Southeast Asian countries - EastMojo
articles.description: The World Health Organisation (WHO) on Monday called for focused efforts to provide life-saving vaccines to nearly 4.6 million unvaccinated children in Southeast Asia as countries intensify efforts to equal or surpass pre-Covid vaccination coverage levels.
